title: All Chat in Spectator
body:
For some reason, regardless of repairing the client, uninstalling/reinstalling, and clicking the box, I cannot get all chat to work in spectator mode. It's been a consistent issue for a while and I'm just lost on ideas. Googling it led to things from about 2012/2013 and their tips didn't help either.

Ideas?

replies.body:
Oooooo I'm sorry to have to be the one to tell you this, but we don't actually have chat enabled in spectator mode as far as I know. If you were able to chat with the players, there would be too many options to help one team get the upper hand.

With that being said, the idea of being able to chat with the other people watching that match would be pretty neat!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bW3mLovc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-15T04:07:49.206+0000)
>
> Oooooo I'm sorry to have to be the one to tell you this, but we don't actually have chat enabled in spectator mode as far as I know. If you were able to chat with the players, there would be too many options to help one team get the upper hand.
> 
> With that being said, the idea of being able to chat with the other people watching that match would be pretty neat!

Nooo, I don't mean chatting with the team directly, but to read the chat they were having. I know a friend of mine has done it, because he was reading the chat log to me while spectating the same game I was. o.o

You can get all chat to show up, but only all chat. I've often lamented on being able to view team chats while spectating, just because I wonder if one team is afraid of the terror of my friend's Nami, but, only all chat can be enabled for display.

If you're looking for all chat display and aren't seeing it, hit escape while in spectate, select interface then find "Show [All] chat" and that's about it. It shows up for me in spectate. :3
I know I've seen it while spectating a Custom match. I'm unsure, but maybe it's only available there?
when you start spectating and have the all chat open it might not work untick it and tick it again it might work i did this i can see all chat now

Ah! Sorry for misunderstanding you hah ^_^'!

I do believe Daklore is correct here. You should be able to go into the options -> Interface and turn on the chat.
